column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Ah-mazing pizza! I had never had Chicago style deep dish pizza before and now I only want to eat it. It's so delicious and good. This location is insanely busy. We arrived after 8pm and were told it would be a 90 minute wait. It turned out to only be a 60 minute wait and they do get you to preorder your pizza so it arrives at your table shortly after you are seated
column2: but it would be good to be able to order some starters to eat while you wait.
